message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if that works for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.
I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product for $12500. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $12500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $11000.  Let me know if that works for you.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $12000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product for $12250. Let's see if we can meet in the middle again.
